titleStmt.title: Tenir per seruice de chiualer, est a tenir per homage foi alte ...
Old tenures.

notesStmt.note: Title from first two lines of text.
Imprint from colophon; date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Royal coat of arms of King of England opposite first page of text.
Identified as part of STC 15725 at reel 97:6a.
Reproductions of originals in the British Library (reel 97) and Bodleian Library (reel 1717).
